main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Baltimore, Maryland, on October 9, consisting of a circular red shape seen by a witness and her son.
interesting points: The object was reported to be flying at an estimated altitude of 2300 feet., The sighting was made visually reported by Mrs. Virginia Garrison and her son Sidney Ingram., The object was seen moving in a westerly direction with speed unknown., Ground-radar detected an unidentified target at an altitude of 28,000 feet., Friendship Airport reported no aircraft down or additional sightings.
witness description: Mrs. Virginia Garrison and her son Sidney Ingram, age 14
